content: Is it okay for me add a new label: A-zst for zero-sized types?
I'm going to add it, let me know if I should remove it for some reason
If it's useful, then it's worth adding.
Yeah, I wanted to add it to an issue. Just wasn't sure of the protocol :)
Are there more than 2 or 3 issues that would use said label?
I'm not aware of any problems that are specific to ZSTs that aren't a more general problem in some way.
So far I've come across 3 issues where I applied the label: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3AA-zst
There's a label for DSTs, and there are some situations where it's specific to ZSTs, so I thought a label might help.
